about_the_game:
With the Dead War devaluing gold to nothing, the survivors have found a new use for it. Annihilate the undead with an air of class! Apply a brilliant gold sheen to your guns with these skins*.
*Skins can be applied to all weapons included in the base game, and are not compatible with DLC weapons.
detailed_description:
With the Dead War devaluing gold to nothing, the survivors have found a new use for it. Annihilate the undead with an air of class! Apply a brilliant gold sheen to your guns with these skins*.
*Skins can be applied to all weapons included in the base game, and are not compatible with DLC weapons.

name: Zombie Army 4: Solid Gold Weapon Skins

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 10 64-bit / Windows 7 64-bit*
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6100 (or AMD equivalent)
  • Graphics: Nvidia GT 1030 2GB (or AMD equivalent)
  • Additional Notes: *Windows 7 64-bit version 7601 supported only via the Vulkan launcher option.

short_description: With the Dead War devaluing gold to nothing, the survivors have found a new use for it. Annihilate the undead with an air of class! Apply a brilliant gold sheen to your guns with these skins.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
